elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Indicate whether the following statements are correct or incorrect and give reasons for your answer:

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Determining personnel requirements is a typical business process, because a company cannot operate without employees.
elements.correctAnswer: Wrong; is a typical support process.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Strategic corporate management is both upstream and downstream of the business and support processes.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Which markets a company should be active in is the question of a financial process.

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Indicate whether the following statements are correct or incorrect and give reasons for your answer:

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Materials management deals with the question of which product is to be produced in which variants.
elements.correctAnswer: Wrong; materials management deals in particular with the purchasing and storage of production factors.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: The cross-divisional finance function deals exclusively with financial accounting and the preparation of the balance sheet and income statement.
elements.correctAnswer: Wrong; there are some additional areas of application, such as financing (financial management) or management accounting (e.g. costing).

elements.name: question6
elements.title: HR managers are responsible for ensuring that there are always enough staff to maintain the service creation process.
